# Bibliometric Analysis Tutorial

## Overview

This repository contains a tutorial for performing bibliometric analysis using the `bibliometrix` R package. Bibliometric analysis is a quantitative method to study scholarly communication patterns by analyzing publication metadata.

This is a personal collection of curated notes and codes.
